Imagery Description: Body: (a) Fat siren in front of draped woman, with red drapery over shoulders, and held in left hand, right holding spray, (b) almost completely missing, save for the head and hand of a woman.
Additional Notes: Lid: The lid is in three sections: (i) a lekanis, on top of which is (ii) a second lekanis, on top of which is (iii) a lebes gamikos. (i) and (iii) are decorated with plain female heads; (ii) with fanNon Sepcifiedpalmettes with inNon Sepcifiedcurving leaves. With this go a battered lid 24657 and a lekanis 24659, both depicting female heads.
Artist: The Painter of Naples 2585 and his circle
